original: **Map Status: No Stripper!**
WARMUP
zh_trans: 热身回合

original: **Map Ported by Waffel. Thanks to NiceShot with helping.**
zh_trans: **Map Ported by Waffel. 感谢 NiceShot 的帮助.**

original: !! For better game experience, set your Graphical settings on High and Brightness 100% !!
zh_trans: !! 为了更好的游戏体验，请将游戏画面设置改为高，并将亮度调整为100% !!

original: **[Setzer] We have finally arrived. Welcome to Mt Bur-Omisace**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 我们终于到了，欢迎来到神都布尔奥米赛斯**

original: **[Setzer] You have to go the rest of the way on your own. Flying closer is prohibited!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 剩下的路得自己走了，神都附近是严禁飞行的 **

original: **[Setzer] We meet soon after Ashe talk to Al-Cid Margrace of Rozarria!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 我们在艾雪和阿尔希德·马格拉斯的交谈后见面! **

original: **[Setzer] Good luck!**
zh_trans: **[西捷亚] 一路顺风! **

original: **[Tonberry] Hello my friends! I sell and buy rare items! Take a look through my assortment**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 你好我的朋友! 我能出售和收购稀有物品! 有兴趣来看看吗?**

original: **[Tonberry] I lost my Workshop Keys could you help we find them?**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 我丢了工作室的钥匙，您能帮我找找么?**

original: **[Tonberry] Thanks as a gratitude I'll give you a small gift when you next time give back all Keys**
zh_trans: **[冬贝利] 谢谢你! 作为答谢，下次你归还所有后，我会给你一份小礼物 **

original: **Defend here for 25 seconds until the gates open**
zh_trans: ** 25 秒后门开 **

original: **A player has picked up Cure Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 治愈魔法 **

original: **[Bash] The temple was built here by believers**
zh_trans: **[巴什] 这座神庙由信徒们所造 **

original: **[Bash] They did it to mark the place where the founder of the Light of Kiltia began to spread the teachings**
zh_trans: **[巴什] 他们这样做是为了纪念基尔提亚教的创始人在此处传播教义**

original: **[Bash] There are accounts of the holy city here dating back to writings from the age of the Galtean Alliance**
zh_trans: **[巴什] 这里有记载神都的历史，可以追溯到加尔提亚联盟时代的文献。**

original: **A player has picked up Sand Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 沙魔法**

original: **The Gates of Temple will open in 35 seconds!**
zh_trans: ** 神庙的门 35 秒后开启**

original: **A player has picked up Thunder Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 电魔法 **

original: **[Bash] Find the way to the Hall of The Light and talk with Gran Kiltias**
zh_trans: **[巴什] 找到前往光之殿的路，并与大僧正对话**

original: **[Bash] The gates are open. We have finally entered the temple**
zh_trans: **[巴什] 门开了. 我们终于进入神庙了**

original: **A player has picked up Fear Magick**
zh_trans: ** 玩家拾起了 恐惧魔法**
